item.description:
Casco Bay Women’s Overnight Kayak Retreat
August 20th – 21st.


Join Coastal Maine Kayak for a Women’s Overnight Kayak Retreat on Casco Bay. Enjoy 2 days of paddling and exploring various Maine islands. The trip will start Friday at Portland's East End Beach. Paddle to a beautiful island for a picnic lunch on route to an island campsite. Gourmet meals will be prepared by your guides. Wake up to the sound of the sea. Then begin Saturday morning with yoga session lead by a certified yoga instructor, before your second day of paddling. Day two we will continue to explore the scenic Casco Bay on our way back to the East End Beach.

Details
Cost is $200.00 per person with a two week registration notice and four person minimum to run the program. The cost includes all required safety equipment: boat, paddle, personal floatation device (life vest), spray skirt; Also included are meals and snacks. Please see our list of necessary overnight items on our website



To register e-mail info@coastalmainekayak.com or call 207-967-6065

The use of personal boats and gear provided it meets our safety standards.

Cancellations/Refunds
Cancellations require a 24 hour notice for a full refund.
item.name: Casco Bay Women’s Overnight Kayak Retreat
